conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I think I've got just the thing for you! Have you considered "Prisoners" (2013)? It's a gripping thriller that explores the emotional toll of a child's disappearance on two desperate parents, played by Hugh Jackman and Jake Gyllenhaal. The film is full of twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more cerebral, I'd recommend "Memento" (2000). This mind-bending thriller tells the story of a man with short-term memory loss who sets out to avenge his wife's murder. The film's unique reverse-chronological structure will keep you guessing and emotionally invested in the protagonist's quest for justice.
